name: getStatements
description: By passing in parameters, you can search for matching statements

pageSize.description: Page size which specifies how many records per page will be returned (default 10). Example - https://api.xero.com/bankfeeds.xro/1.0/Statements?pageSize=100 to specify page size of 100.

$ul: **page**: Page number which specifies the set of records to retrieve. Example - https://api.xero.com/bankfeeds.xro/1.0/Statements?page=2 to get the second set of the records. When page value is not a number or a negative number, by default, the first set of records is returned.
**pageSize**: Page size which specifies how many records per page will be returned (default 50). Example - https://api.xero.com/bankfeeds.xro/1.0/Statements?pageSize=100 to specify page size of 100.

**page**: Page number which specifies the set of records to retrieve. Example - https://api.xero.com/bankfeeds.xro/1.0/Statements?page=2 to get the second set of the records. When page value is not a number or a negative number, by default, the first set of records is returned.
**pageSize**: Page size which specifies how many records per page will be returned (default 50). Example - https://api.xero.com/bankfeeds.xro/1.0/Statements?pageSize=100 to specify page size of 100.
